entry.title: CTV+CSFS: Can we reach consensus on a first step towards covenants?
entry.summary:
The discussion revolves around the intentions of various Lightning developers to implement LN Symmetry, contingent on the availability of CTV+CSFS. This move has generated interest and anticipation within the community, prompting a call for statements or feedback from those actively contributing to the Lightning specifications. The implication here is that such an implementation could represent significant advancements or changes in how the Lightning Network operates, potentially enhancing its functionality or efficiency.
For more information on the discussions and updates directly from one of the key contributors, you can follow this [link](https://x.com/rusty_twit/status/1865546920779022434).
